 Galvatron smiled. "How about this. Cyngar go and do a scout mission on the 
other pred faction. They're base is located here." He pointed to the map with 
the location of the tripred base.  "Found out what you can the numbers and 
such. Then report back and Ill mae my decesion." 

--part1_93.1fd26d60.2a5e4173_boundary
